SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ServerRMI

Interface VirtualMainServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
MainServerRMI
public interface VirtualMainServer extends Remote
This interface represents the remote interface of the MainServerRMI. RMI clients can call remote method specified in this interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    VirtualGameServer
    createGame(VirtualClient clientRMI, String gameName, String nickname, int numPlayer)
    This method is used by client to create a new game
    VirtualGameServer

    This method is used by client to create a new game
    void
    disconnect(VirtualClient clientRMI, String nickname)
    This method is used by clients who need to explicitly disconnect themselves from server, so both game and lobby.
    void
    disconnectFromGame(VirtualClient clientRMI, String nickname)
    This method is used by clients who need to explicitly disconnect themselves from game it is actually in, but not from the lobby.
    void
    heartBeat(VirtualClient clientRMI)
    This method is used by client to notify MainServerRMI that they are still alive.

    This method is used by client to reconnect to server (after network disconnection,not explicit disconnection).

  • Method Details

    • registerClient

      void registerClient(VirtualClient client) throws RemoteException
      This method is used to register a new RMI client, to start sending to it heartbeats
      Parameters:
      client - the client to register
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong executing this method

    • newConnection

      void newConnection(VirtualClient clientRMI, String nickName) throws RemoteException
      This method is used when a new client wants to connect to server.
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - is the VirtualClient of the RMI client who wants to connect
      nickName - is the name of the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong executing this method

    • createGame

      VirtualGameServer createGame(VirtualClient clientRMI, String gameName, String nickname, int numPlayer) throws RemoteException
      This method is used by client to create a new game
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - is the VirtualClient of the RMI client who wants to create a new game
      gameName - is the name of the game to build
      nickname - is the nickname of the player
      numPlayer - is the number of the player in game
      Returns:
      VirtualGameServer representing the game server (note that for clients connected to same game, different VirtualGameServer will be returned). Returns null if action cannot be performed.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong executing this method

    • createGame

      VirtualGameServer createGame(VirtualClient clientRMI, String gameName, String nickname, int numPlayer, long randomSeed) throws RemoteException
      This method is used by client to create a new game
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - is the VirtualClient of the RMI client who wants to create a new game
      gameName - is the name of the game to build
      nickname - is the nickname of the player
      numPlayer - is the number of the player in game
      randomSeed - is the random seed on which build the game
      Returns:
      VirtualGameServer representing the game server (note that for clients connected to same game, different VirtualGameServer will be returned). Returns null if action cannot be performed.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong executing this method

    • joinGame

      VirtualGameServer joinGame(VirtualClient clientRMI, String gameName, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method is used by client to join game with the specified name
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - is the VirtualClient of the RMI client who wants to join game
      gameName - is the name of the game to enter
      nickname - is the nickname of the requesting player
      Returns:
      VirtualGameServer representing the game server (note that for clients connected to same game, different VirtualGameServer will be returned). Returns null if action cannot be performed.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong while executing this method.

    • joinFirstAvailableGame

      VirtualGameServer joinFirstAvailableGame(VirtualClient clientRMI, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method is used by client to join first available game
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - is the VirtualClient of the RMI client who wants to join a game
      nickname - is the nickname of the requesting player
      Returns:
      VirtualGameServer representing the game server (note that for clients connected to same game, different VirtualGameServer will be returned). Returns null if action cannot be performed or there are no available games.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong while performing the requested action.

    • reconnect

      VirtualGameServer reconnect(VirtualClient clientRMI, String nickname, String token) throws RemoteException
      This method is used by client to reconnect to server (after network disconnection,not explicit disconnection).
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - is the VirtualClient of the RMI client who wants to reconnect
      nickname - is the nickname of the requesting client
      token - is the private token of the client
      Returns:
      VirtualGameServer representing the game server (note that for clients connected to same game, different VirtualGameServer will be returned). Returns null if reconnection cannot be performed (for example client is not registered in server) or client is not registered to any game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong while performing the requested action.

    • disconnect

      void disconnect(VirtualClient clientRMI, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method is used by clients who need to explicitly disconnect themselves from server, so both game and lobby.
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - is VirtualClient of the requesting client
      nickname - is the nickname of the requesting client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong while performing the requested action

    • heartBeat

      void heartBeat(VirtualClient clientRMI) throws RemoteException
      This method is used by client to notify MainServerRMI that they are still alive.
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - is the VirtualClient of the sender client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong while performing the requested action.

    • requestAvailableGames

      void requestAvailableGames(VirtualClient clientRMI, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method is used by client to ask MainServerRMI about games it can join.
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - is the VirtualClient of the sender client
      nickname - is the nickname of the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong while performing the requested action.

    • disconnectFromGame

      void disconnectFromGame(VirtualClient clientRMI, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method is used by clients who need to explicitly disconnect themselves from game it is actually in, but not from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - is VirtualClient of the requesting client
      nickname - is the nickname of the requesting client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong while performing the requested action
